rule.name: For the Greater Good
rule.effect: If your Army Faction is T’au Empire, then in your Shooting phase units from your army can work in pairs to help each other target specific enemy units. When they do this, one unit is the Observer unit and the other is their Guided unit. The enemy they are targeting is called their Spotted unit. Each time you select this unit to shoot, if it is not an Observer unit, it can use this ability. If it does, select one other friendly unit with this ability that is also eligible to shoot (excluding Fortification, Battleshocked and Observer units). Until the end of the phase, this unit is considered a Guided unit, and that friendly unit is considered an Observer unit. Then select one enemy unit that is visible to both your units to be their Spotted unit.
size: Until the end of the phase:

Each time a model in a Guided unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of the attack by 1 and, if their Observer unit has the Markerlight keyword, the attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.
Each time a model in a Guided unit makes an attack that does not target their Spotted unit, worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of the attack by 1.

detachments.name: Kauyon
restrictions: If your army includes any Ethereal units, it cannot include a Commander Farsight model.
If your army includes a Commander Farsight model, it cannot include any Ethereal units.
detachments.effect: From the third battle round onwards, all ranged weapons equipped by T’au Empire models from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. While a unit is a Guided unit (see For the Greater Good), weapons in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

enhancements.name: Exemplar of the Kauyon
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit’s Kauyon Detachment rule takes effect from the second battle round onwards instead of the third.

enhancements.name: Puretide Engram Neuroship
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). Once per turn, you can use a Stratagem on the bearer’s unit, even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.

enhancements.name: Precision of the Patient Hunter
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only. Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. From the third battle round onwards, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

enhancements.name: Through Unity, Devastation
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in their Guided unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability while targeting their Spotted unit.

stratagems.name: Stimm Injectors
stratagems.when: Fight phase or your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

stratagems.name: Coordinate to Engage
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire unit from your army that has just been selected as an Observer unit (see For the Greater Good).
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and, if your unit has the Markerlight keyword, that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

stratagems.name: Strike and Fade
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that can Fly whose attacks have been resolved this phase.
stratagems.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move. If it does, your unit cannot declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.name: Point-Blank Ambush
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

stratagems.name: Photon Grenades
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Grenades unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must immediately take a Battle-shock test, and until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: Combat Emarkation
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Infantry unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge, and one friendly Transport.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can embark within that Transport. If it does, your opponent can select new targets for that charge.
stratagems.restrictions: Every model in your T’au Empire Infantry unit must be within 3" of that Transport and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

drones.name: Guardian Drone
drones.effect: Each time a model makes a ranged attack that targets the bearer’s unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

drones.name: Gun Drone
drones.effect: The bearer is equipped with the following ranged weapon

drones.name: Marker Drone
drones.effect: The bearer’s unit has the Markerlight keyword and can act as an Observer unit for another unit even if it Advanced this turn.

drones.name: Missile Drone
drones.effect: The bearer is equipped with the following ranged weapon

drones.name: Shield Drone
drones.effect: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

data.name: Agile Combatant
data.effect: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

data.name: Hero of the Empire (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly T’au Empire unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

wargear.name: Advanced Guardian Drone
wargear.effect: Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

wargear.name: Command-link Drone (Aura)
wargear.effect: While a friendly T’au Empire unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

leader.name: Way of the Short Blade
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Aggressive Offensive
data.effect: Once per battle, when this model is selected to fight, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time it makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

leader.name: Crisis Commander
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

leader.name: Enforcer Commander
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

leader.name: Coldstar Commander
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Move characteristic of 12" and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

leader.name: Volley Fire
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit.

data.name: Crack Shot
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -3.

leader.name: The Shaper Commands
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If models in that unit destroy an enemy unit in the Fight phase, then until the end of the battle, while this model is leading that unit, models in the unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

data.name: Ritualistic Feeding
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of its Shaper’s ritual blade.

leader.name: Failure Is Not an Option
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

data.name: Coordinated Leadership
data.effect: In your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

wargear.name: Hover Drone
wargear.effect: The bearer can Fly and has a Move characteristic of 10".

data.name: Duality Shield
data.effect: Once per battle, each time an attack targets this unit, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 2+ invulnerable save.

data.name: Paradox of Duality
data.effect: Each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

data.name: Supreme Loyalty (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly T’au Empire unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, add 1 to that test.

leader.name: Inspirational Defiance
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

data.name: Martial Warrior
data.effect: Each time this model is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities to be active while resolving those attacks:
Direct Grace: Fidelity has the [PRECISION] ability.
Forceful Strike: Fidelity has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
Whirling Stance: Fidelity has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead of [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

leader.name: Structural Analyser
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Jammer Array
data.effect: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

data.name: Armour Hunter
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: XV02 Pilot Battlesuit
data.effect: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly Hammerhead Gunship unit within 12". Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Cover Fire
data.effect: While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, each time you select it as the target of the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 4+ when resolving that Stratagem.

data.name: DS8 Support Turret
data.effect: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

data.name: Breach and Clear
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

data.name: DS8 Support Turret
data.effect: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

data.name: Grisly Feast
data.effect: If this unit destroys an enemy unit in the Fight phase, until the end of the battle, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability

data.name: Kroot Packmates
data.effect: While one or more friendly Kroot Carnivore units are within 6" of this unit, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Turbo-jets
data.effect: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

data.name: Forward Observers
data.effect: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in their Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Homing Beacon
wargear.effect: Once per battle, you can use the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP. The target must be set up within 3" of the bearer’s unit and not within 9" of any enemy units.

data.name: Stealth Drones
data.effect: Twice per battle, after an attack has been allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back but it loses the Smoke keyword.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Precise Targeting
data.effect: While this model is a Guided unit, each time it makes an attack that targets its Spotted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

data.name: Target Uploaded
data.effect: Once per turn, when using the Greater Good ability, you can select this unit to be an Observer unit for a second time. When doing so, you can change which enemy unit is this unit’s Spotted unit.

wargear.name: Grav-inhibitor Drone
wargear.effect: Subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for any enemy unit that declares a charge against the bearer’s unit (this is not cumulative with any other reductions to that Charge roll).

wargear.name: Pulse Accelerator Drone
wargear.effect: Add 6" to the Range characteristic of pulse carbines equipped by models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear.name: Recon Drone
wargear.effect: The bearer is equipped with 1 drone burst cannon and the bearer’s unit has the Infiltrators ability.

data.name: Drone Harassment Tactics
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

data.name: Airborne Agility
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

data.name: Hunting Pack
data.effect: While one or more friendly Kroot Carnivore units within 6" of this unit are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Advanced Armour
data.effect: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

data.name: Battlesuit Support System
data.effect: The bearer is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

data.name: Nova Charge
data.effect: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, select one ranged weapon equipped by this model. Until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

data.name: Weapon Support System
data.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Drone Harassment Tactics
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.
